helpful: 2 of 2 people (100%) found this review helpful
review: This game is a good RTS type of game where you could turn the tide of any battle with yourself and your troops you have equiped on your Airmech.

A really great game to play when you have a bit of free time on your hands. And just to mention that this game is getting better with every update it gets so I highly recommend this game for everyone to play.
